forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. West wind 6 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn gently unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a cool crispness, the lingering touch of night still palpable. With a low near 48 degrees, the remnants of a partly cloudy sky whisper of a peaceful solitude, illuminated only by the twinkling lights of a city slowly awakening. As the day progresses, the sun will break through, heralding a sunny spectacle with a high reaching approximately 64 degrees. A steady west wind will provide a refreshing cadence, making the day feel all the more invigorating.

Yet, on this morning, the horizon holds onto a veil of fog, a soft marine layer curling around the coast and enveloping the Golden Gate. It is a reminder of the dance between land and sea, where the warmth of the day will gradually tease the cool moisture back toward the ocean. With such atmospheric conditions, a lightweight jacket may serve as a reliable companion for early ventures. Consider a stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a quiet coffee in a sunlit café, where the warmth from the sun mingles with the aromatic notes of freshly brewed java. Such mundane pursuits become little escapes, a way to cradle the day’s promise of clarity and renewal.
